Vamprah::

She though a while  all things that -Devilduel had
told her... and she asked again:

"Do you think that he mightl  want to reprogram me?"

--- logomorph@... wrote:
> Diamond::
> 
> She thought about what Devilduer had said to
> Vamprah. If what he said 
> was true, then what could this group offer her? She
> wondered what 
> could they give her for what she could offer them?
> She knew that she 
> had all the codes and information from the
> Cybertronian Predacon 
> Council.  But what could they give her? The only
> thing she could 
> think of was a safe place to stay untill she could
> figure out 
> something. For now, what safety they offered was
> needed. She looked 
> at Devilduer. She noticed from his actions, he was a
> seasoned 
> warrior. ANd if the others were anything like him,
> they could give 
> her the protection she needed. She wondered if they
> would ever think 
> to ask about what she knew. Then she wondered just
> how much she would 
> tell them.
> 
>
